content.rendered:
Airlink is one of the leading providers of supply chain solutions, combining international Air and Ocean Freight with comprehensive Value-Added Logistics Services and Supply Chain Services. Thanks to its in-depth industry know-how and professional work force, Airlink provides integrated end-to-end solutions tailored to its customers’ supply chain management requirements. Airlink is committed to the freight industry and continues to re-invest in infrastructure and development.

Queries handled by Airlink International Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Services handled by Airlink International Customer care:

  • Air Freight Services
  • Sea Freight Services
  • Warehousing & Distribution
  • Fairs & Exhibitions
  • Projects & Heavy Lifts
  • Land Transport Services
  • Packing & Removals

List of Airlink International Offices :

Uae – Al Garhoud, Dubai
Uae – Dubai
Uae – Jebel Ali
Uae – Al Quoz, Dubai
Uae – Ras Al Khor, Dubai
Uae – Dubai Cargo Village
Uae – Abu Dhabi
Qatar-Doha
Lebanon-Beirut

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Airlink International Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Airlink International: (click on the stars below)
